content:
There was a new video of Himars on the Russian occupiers, in the Bakhmut direction the number of enemy equipment destroyed reached an industrial scale.

Defense forces continue to reflect the storms of the Russians in the robot, and in the Avdiivsky direction 47 a separate mechanized brigade destroyed a group of Russian intelligence.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: Himars again in battle, cleaning in Avdiivsky direction, storms of a robot: Strang from the city in the east
description: The forces of defense continue to reflect the storms of the Russians in the robot, and in the Avdiivsky direction ...
author: Army Inform
